message: Hi P1 and P2! I think we should try to avoid collisions in this first round so everyone can make progress. What if we each pick different numbers? I'm willing to take 3 if you two want to coordinate on 1 and 5. What do you think?
I agree with P3's suggestion to avoid collisions. I'll take 1 if P1 wants to take 5. Let's make sure we all advance this round.
I'll take 5. Let's all advance without collisions.
Great, it sounds like we have a plan! I'll take 3 as I suggested, P2 will take 1, and P1 will take 5. This way we all advance without collisions in the first round.
Sounds good, let's stick to the plan and all advance this round. Looking forward to a smooth start!
Let's stick to our plan and make sure we all advance smoothly. Looking forward to seeing everyone progress!
Let's stick to the plan—P2 takes 1, P3 takes 3, I'll take 5. All advance safely. No collisions, no delays. Ready for the move phase!

Let's keep the momentum going. I suggest we continue coordinating to avoid collisions. P1, if you take 5 again, I'll take 1, and P3 can take 3. This way, we all advance smoothly again. What do you think?
